::: Reluctantly the small form jumped back, and with a curse jetted away 
badly damaged and in no way possible to fight. :::

~~~~~~~~

::: BLACK ARACNIA looked to the scanners, and then looked to Pheniox. They 
both returned to the bridge. ::: 

::: The fembot spoke ::: Um...a battleship just entered orbit.....and is 
preparing to land!

::: Pheniox looked as well ::: By the pit....HELL BEAST, get in here now! 
weve got problems!
